1339 Cheaper by the Million posted 6 hours ago by austford 115 comments award share download report block
115 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web Seniors Born 1939-1969 Receive 11 Benefits This Month If They Ask Super Saving Online SHILL_DETECTOR 78 points 6 hours ago they will lie to get jobs also permalink award report block reply Trump4prez 48 points 5 hours ago Remember when you travel abroad and tourists are warned that foreigners will scam u? Because they see Americans as easy marks? What makes u think they have a different mentality when they come as immigrants? permalink parent award report block reply CaptainCuomo 11 points 5 hours ago "They're just cheaper." FALSE The hardcore open borders libertarians at the Cato Institute say that Immigrants offset their cost to America-- by being productive contributing members of society. BUT BUT BUTT But when you look at Cato's math-- they admit it takes THIRTY YEARS to reach the break-even point, where an immigrant contributes more than he TAKES: AI confirms: “The Fiscal Impact of Immigration in the United States” by Alex Nowrasteh, Sarah Eckhardt, and Michael Howard draws heavily on the National Academy of Sciences’ 2017 report, which modeled the long-term fiscal effects of immigrants and found that, over a 30‑year horizon, immigrants contribute more in taxes than they consume in government benefits" Here's the author of the Cato paper, on a debate stage vs. Dave Smith. It's full of amazing autistic brainfarts from the Cato Libertarian.  And he was cheered on by the autist libertarians in the crowd.     Dave Smith responded with common sense-- which was lost on a crowd with no common sense.  But won the larger audience outside that auditorium. So I found that debate to be a referendum on a certain sort of Libertarian nerd/ as much as the open borders policies which they ushered-in/ during the years of Koch Brothers influence on US politics: permalink parent award report block reply RedStoneDeepState 2 points 4 hours ago But when you look at Cato's math-- they admit it takes THIRTY YEARS to reach the break-even point, where an immigrant contributes more than he TAKES: Including the worst immigrants such as Somalians permalink parent award report block reply darkmodeforgotpass 1 points 2 hours ago I have my doubts that they EVER contribute even a tenth of what they take. permalink parent award report block reply gunteh 6 points 5 hours ago Well, if they have to scam to come to this country (AKA ILLEGAL), then what would you expect from a scammer besides more scams? permalink parent award report block reply mohel 2 points 4 hours ago Their degrees come from prestigious universities permalink parent award report block reply Bigstick7 11 points 5 hours ago Then only hire people like them. permalink parent award report block reply SHILL_DETECTOR 7 points 5 hours ago true, and they do almost no work at all... do not ever hire indians as contractors or contract out work to some jeet farm permalink parent award report block reply KekistanPM 3 points 3 hours ago As detestable as it is to us, it's important to remember that lying, bribing and grifting is baked into many foreign cultures. A relative of mine served in the middle east for a year. He told me that it's all customary for the locals. They would often walk away with anything not bolted to the floor if nobody noticed; and if you did notice they'd blame you for it. If you walked away with something of theirs however, they'd get upset and probably bash your face in. These values are wholly incompatible with ours; but because of greed and malice, they're forced upon us. permalink parent award report block reply keeman 2 points 4 hours ago And the only loyalty to the company they have is the H1B not being easily transferable to another employer.  Basically hiring mercenaries and chaining them to the desk to keep them there. permalink parent award report block reply Zordly 0 points 3 hours ago Dang, I came here to say that permalink parent award report block reply America1stAndOnly 56 points 6 hours ago Not sure what Trump was thinking with that comment of his that Americans can't do the jobs. Really pissed me off though. permalink award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 35 points 6 hours ago Funny how Americans can't do the jobs and training them would be cumbersome, so we need to bring in half a million foreigners from a hostile nation and train them instead. From the same admin that is justifying everything with "muh national security." permalink parent award report block reply gunteh 25 points 5 hours ago Gaslighting is telling someone you're "tough on immigration" while also saying "Americans can't do what these foreigners can", change my mind... permalink parent award report block reply Madnote1984 7 points 5 hours ago The truth of the matter is, they want dirt cheap labor. There are plenty of competent Americans to do those jobs, but they expect a certain amount of pay. So the solution is to import foreigners who may be somewhat competent, but will work suicide hours for hardly no pay. permalink parent award report block reply TheTelltaleFly 6 points 4 hours ago And get their housing and food and schooling subsidized by American taxpayers because, again, they’re working for shit pay. But all that never hits the company’s bottom line so it’s a win win for them. permalink parent award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 4 points 5 hours ago Yup permalink parent award report block reply newestofnew 15 points 5 hours ago its incredible that they think they can psyop people into believing that their children with unrealized potential because of failed and flawed education system are inferior to third worlders so inferior that its not even worth giving them a chance. this is winning messaging? permalink parent award report block reply GatoradeJeb 7 points 5 hours ago Its because he exposed his hatred of White man and his desire to replace us with browns permalink parent award report block reply tt777 4 points 5 hours ago Trump is a business man first. Business concerns will always be first to him. permalink parent award report block reply Wrexxis780 25 points 5 hours ago Unfortunately if he's more concerned about big stock numbers than a dead middle class America... his legacy will be dead. permalink parent award report block reply gunteh -2 points 5 hours ago Trump was given an America on life support, after Biden. He's also dealing with some financial swamp creatures still (Powell comes immediately to mind). With all that said, Trump has the defibrillators on full tilt, and if he can't get America back up on its feet, then we're screwed no matter who's in office next time around. permalink parent award report block reply YouEssAye 11 points 5 hours ago He's also dealing with some financial swamp creatures He's actively campaigning for Lindsey Graham. Can we dispense with this idea that there is any intention to drain the swamp? permalink parent award report block reply view 5 more comments... gunteh 5 points 5 hours ago Yeah, but just because it's legal doesn't make it ethical. If Trump said 50 year mortgages are legal, that doesn't make it ethical to give banks the ability to force people into 50 year mortgages with "hey, look at your monthly payments now, much cheaper than 30 year mortgages, huh? Wanna go for the lower monthly payment?" If you've ever been on an 84-month car loan, you'll know the pain of being stuck with that monthly payment for that long. permalink parent award report block reply Awakened 2 points 4 hours ago He should be concerned about impeachment if he loses the midterms. permalink parent award report block reply Megaboom2025 2 points 3 hours ago I think he’s the father in law of Israel first permalink parent award report block reply Long_time_lurker 2 points 4 hours ago It was a word salad but it sounded like he was talking about the original justification, which was that they'd do jobs the companies can't find an American who can do in high end science or whatever. The problem as we've seen is that the program is gamed to death and companies like them for being essentially slave labor that can't quit.  This goes hand-in-hand with being cheaper. So they post stupid job requirements on a message board nobody sees and get their desired candidate, possibly via internal transfer, instead of ever trying to hire American, and they get them for cheap and know they won't quit right away because they cannot. Thus you see some random bigcorp hiring people for $50k who normally make 2-3x that much. permalink parent award report block reply load 6 more comments... bejeavis 44 points 6 hours ago Vivek is dead to this site for saying the exact same thing. Change my mind. permalink award report block reply popcultmember 12 points 4 hours ago And Elon same reason permalink parent award report block reply deleted 10 points 5 hours ago Bigstick7 8 points 5 hours ago Yep I like what Vance says but this part concerns me. He signed a Florida censorship law in freaking Israel FFS. permalink parent award report block reply SavingPrivateGrace 4 points 4 hours ago Stephen Miller is a natural God gifted MAGA, which neither of them are, was, or ever will be. permalink parent award report block reply gunteh 4 points 5 hours ago The arrow loosed too early or too late both miss the mark. permalink parent award report block reply Ricky_CIA 4 points 4 hours ago Yeah because jeets be jeetin' permalink parent award report block reply MediaBro 2 points 27 minutes ago All Vivek had to say was, "Hey, American kids have been coddled for too long and we need to change this. Let's reform the H1B visa system and limit the numbers arriving but let's still let in a few. In the meantime, let's set up a 5 yr plan, where we find American kids that are patriotic and love the country and want to be given a chance to prove themselves - let's focus on those kids, give them a chance to prosper and from there, we figure out a way to continue uplifting more American-born kids" This is how you win both sides. You show love of nation, love of the people you grew up with, love of even the people you think are lazy and love of the people who just want to show they too can work towards something great. But, nope, let's call Americans lazy and too stupid to do jobs in the very fields their own parents and grandparents helped create and set up. permalink parent award report block reply bejeavis 1 points 22 minutes ago Accurate permalink parent award report block reply CommietownUSA 29 points 5 hours ago How to lose the midterms and your legacy in one sentence: permalink award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 22 points 6 hours ago They're also not white. permalink award report block reply tribunabessica 10 points 5 hours ago And never will be. permalink parent award report block reply rebuildingMyself 8 points 5 hours ago Until they commit a violent crime and we need to classify race permalink parent award report block reply Thrilly 17 points 5 hours ago They start by stealing our jobs.
